column5: Joey, I am so sorry to hear about your loss. My condolences.
joey sorry for your loss
I'm SO SORRY to hear of your loss Joey - My prayers to you and your family during these rough times.

I'm very sorry about the loss of your father.  Every fishing trip with the people you love should be cherished always as much as they have before and after.  Every occasion counts, and awesome of you to make your fishing trip a golden memory.
So sorry about your loss Joey, my thoughts are with you and family
My sincerest condolences. Jeez, we've had a lot of family pass away over the past few months around here. Take care.
Deepest Condolences Joey!  Dont be afraid to go and wet a line when you need some quite and down time!
Wow Joey hang in there, very sorry to hear this.
my condolences Joey

Thanks again everyone.  Today is one more day further from the sad day he passed.  But its one day closer to the funeral.  Here are the details for anyone who asked:  Trinity Anglican Church 79 Victoria Street Aurora, ONtario L4G 1R3 (905) 727-6101  Date:  Monday, October 5, 2009  Service:  11:00 a.m. Reception downstairs at 12 noon  Just working on the obituary now and it will be in the Star and the Globe tomorrow or the next day.  I'm overwhelmed by the responses and really do appreciate everyone's warm thoughts and prayers.  Joey
I'm very sorry, Joanne, for your loss.  My condolences to you and your family.
So sorry to hear of your loss Joey. I have not been able to be on here much lately and only read this tonight. Take care. Brian
My deepest sympathies Joey to you and your family.  I can't believe it I recently enjoyed your fishing report with Dad.  So glad you did get out with him recently.  MTP
very sorry to hear this joey, you have my condolences and prayers.  jason
Very sorry to hear of your loss. It's great that you were able to enjoy fishing with him.
Very sorry for your loss Joey.  Every time this happens I wish I could spend more time with my Dad.  It's great that you got out with him.  He looked so happy.  Take care,  Grant
Sorry for your loss,looks like he enjoyed fishing as much as we all do thanks for the pics,makes me think of my Dad..  Hawg Hunter
Very sorry for your loss Joey.
Sorry about your loss.
Sad to learn of your loss....  Stay Strong..Keep the Faith.Cherish the Memories  Yours in Stewardship,   Paul    Simcoe...The Other Great Lake
" My condolences to you and your family.
Sorry to hear about your loss Joey. Love those pics of you and you dad fishing.

My condolences...... It is so hard and time only dulls it. Been one year since my daad passed away and it still haunts me everyday. Just try to remember the good times, sounds cliche and corny but it it is true. Chin up!   Darren
Chin up today, Joey. I'm sorry that I can't be with you today, but I'll be with you in thought for sure.

Thanks Roy, and thank you everyone.  Today is the day I bury my father.  I will talk and think only of the great memories we had and of our wonderful childhood with him.  I really do appreciate all the support and am ready to face this reality.  Even though I am very sad, the outpouring of support shows me what great people are here on this earth, but we are only here until it is our time to go.  It was dad's time and I will be paying my respects to his life and memory today.  Thank you all once again.  Joey
Very sorry for your loss.

Thank you again everyone.  These words and condolances are very comforting right now.  I got a bit of sleep and now have the task of making arrangements.  Thanks also for the PM's I've received, I really appreciate all the kind and encouraging words.  Thank you,  Joey
My deepest condolences Joey.
My most hearfelt condolences for your loss.
My Deepest Condolences
Very sorry for your loss. Loosing someone to a sudden situation is definately easier on the departed, but it sure as hell is hard on the survivors. God bless, Jack.
Condolences.....
So sorry to hear about your loss Joey.
Very sorry to hear this news Joey and my sincerest condolences.
Joey, I am so sorry to hear about your loss. My thoughts are going out to you
So sorry to hear Joey, I been off line for a few days and just read the news.  My Deepest condolences to you and your family.
Very sorry to hear that Joey, my deepest condolences to you and your family.

Joey...very sorry to hear of this news.  When I saw that report with your dad, it brought back great memories of the last fishing trip I took with my own father before he passed away.  You will have that, and many other wonderful memories forever.  Our deepest sympathies....  Cliff and Carole
I've been away a few days Joey.......Please accept our condolences for you and yours....TC....Chuck and Shelley....

Sorry to hear Joey, While I did not get a chance to sit down and talk  with your dad the love and guidance that he put into raising you shines thru and puts him into a category of men I wish I had known.  Art

Very sorry to hear of your loss Joey. My deepest condolences go out to you and yours. Wonderful pic of you and your father...always cherish those memories & he'll forever be with you in your thoughts & heart   Hugz
So very sorry Joey. You will remember that day forever.  John & Barbara
Very very sorry to hear the sad news Joey. My condolences to you and your family.

Too my beloved Jo-Anne.I am  sorry for you loss. In the time we have been together, We have lived life's trials and tribulations And we will proceed to move a head no matter what circumstances that life will test use at. The sadness you feel is a good thing. From this you will always remember.   Love you, Paul.
I am sorry for your loss Joey. Keep fond memories close at hand. Jim
Very sad to hear Joey.  Would have loved to get him that bass.  Glad you still got him out with you one lat time.
My condolences to you and your family.  Iti is tough losing a parent.
Sorry to hear the news Joey .  Prayers sent.
my condolonces
Ah geez, I'm sorry Joey, you and your family have my most sincere condolences..  I'm glad you got to take your pops out on one last trip though.
Dang!...Joey...sorry to hear of your loss...  Maribeth's and my prayers are for you...
Joey  My thoughts and prayers are with you and your family.

My heart felt condolences to you Joey... This wont make you feel none the more at ease right now, but from those pic's, you can see the happy life that man was enjoying at that moment and its very clear it was from time being spent with a daughter hes very proud of & loves. Peace to you Joey.......
very sorry to hear about your father Joey. My condolences to you and Paul
My Condolences to you and yours.

My condolences to you both, Joey. My father past 8 years ago, and I find myself thinking about him more these days, because I'm spending more time on the water. Dad was a great outdoorsman, and fishing reminds me of him. I hope these difficult days pass quickly, because you'll enjoy his memory for a long time to come. Chris
Joey, So sad to hear of your loss. please accept our deepest condolencies. Heck, just my age, I guess every year is a bonus.
Joey  I am truly sorry to hear this> My thoughts and prayers are with you.  speed
Sorry to hear of your loss, taking him fishing so recently was a great thing.
Oh My Joey.. It has been only hours that I had seen your post with your father fishing and now this.. Im sooo sorry to hear of your loss.. My condolonces to you and Paul.. Be well
Joey  I am truly sorry to hear of your loss My thoughts and prayers are with you and your Family.

I am so sad to hear this news Joey. I am sure Paul is there to help you out through this tough time to go through as well as all your friends here at OFC.  If there is anything we can do to help out please don't hesitate to ask.  God Bless.  Ron...
Sorry to hear about your loss. My thoughts and prayers are with you and your love ones.
Oh Joey... so sorry to hear of this...  My thoughts are with you and yours
You have my deepest condolences Joey....Your dad looked like a real trooper in those pictures and I'm sure even though he's not around anymore his presence will always be felt...
My deepest sympathies Joey. So sorry for your loss. My thoughts are with you and your family.
Joey, I am so very, very sorry to hear of your dad passing. His spirit will live on and be with you forever in your heart.
Joey; Our sincere condolences to you and your family. Your Dad will always be with you on every fishing trip.  Laurie and Sam
I'm deeply saddened to hear of this Miss Joey. We'll talk soon.
I'm sorry of your loss.  Diane and I offer our deepest and most sincere condolences.  Your memories and your recent fishing trip with your dad, will keep him forever in your heart.  John and Diane
I'm sorry for your loss Joey.
Sorry to hear it Joey.

Dang Joey sorry to here of your loss, the battle is now over and he can rest if you need something please send a message my way as said before you have many great people near you to help out starting with Paul.  The Parkers
I offer my condolences, and hope you and you family can find some peace sooner then later.

Goodbye Dad, I'll miss you.  Dad had a massive heart attack last night and left this world about 2:30 this afternoon.  I'm sure glad I got to take him out fishing one last time.  In the grand scheme of things, I suppose a heart attack is better than a slow painful cancer battle, which is what we were prepared for.  It doesn't make it any easier though.  Love you dad.      Joey

Jesus Joey... give me a ring if you need anything (and or estate advise) and let us know the details if there's a service.  Keep your chin up hun... an uncle and your Father two weeks apart.. just not right.
I was saddened to hear the news Hon. We'll talk soon. They're great shots of a great day on the water with your father.

Prayers from London. The following is a prayer that has helped me countless times in these times of another person's passing.  God Bless  Splashhopper  Lord make me a channel of thy peace - that where there is hatred, I may bring love - that where there is wrong, I may bring the spirit of forgiveness - that where there is discord, I may bring harmony - that where there is error, I may bring truth - that where there is doubt, I may bring faith - that where there is despair, I may bring hope - that where there are shadows, I may bring light - that where there is sadness, I may bring joy. Lord grant that I may seek rather to comfort than to be comforted - to understand, than to be understood - to love, than to be loved.
My Deepest Condolences
Sorry to hear of your loss George
So sorry Joey. That fishing trip with Dad a few weeks ago will live with you forever. I'm sure that he was very proud of you.  Dan and Sis.
My Condolences you and your family.... Some great shots there that will last a life time...  Tiz
O Joey, I am so sorry to hear this. My heartfelt condolences for you and your family.
sorry Joey'
sorry for your loss  but it was great that you got out fishing with him, great memories

Im so glad you got to enjoy a trip out with him like that. it was the same for me 3 years ago with my dad. I got to spend the week before fishing with him and then gone the next. Keep your chin up and remember all the good times you enjoyed with him. My Deepest Condolences Lloyd
Very sincere condolences to you for the loss of your father Joey. I am also glad you got to fish with him just not too long ago. Cherish the memories.
Very sorry to hear of your loss Joey.

So sorry to hear of your dad's sudden passing Joey     I remember you had planned another fishing outing with him.... it's heart braking you haven't gotten another chance...  he seemed very happy out in the boat with you.  Cherish those moments in your heart and fill your thoughts with the happy times you guys shared.... it wasn't too long ago when my dad lost his battle to cancer and to this date, still find myself thinking of the times my father and I spent quality time together fishing and hunting.  Please accept my sincerest condolences and may your beloved father rest in peace. Leechman
Deeply sorry to hear for your loss Joey...

I want to thank all who responded, your words and thoughts and prayers are making it easier to cope.  I think I'll try to get some sleep now as I was at emerg and ICU all night and day.   Hope I can catch a few hours.  Thanks again,  Joey
Just picture that smile in the first picture Hun and you'll sleep just fine.
My family will say an extra prayer for you tonite.  God bless.
I remember your report with your dad a couple of weeks ago.  Bet it means even more to you now.  Sorry for your loss  My thoughts and prayers  Cheers  Craig
Sorry for your loss Joey....  My father was born in '35 as well and I am not (probably never will be) ready for him to leave me either. My families thoughts are with you.  Burt
Sorry to hear Joey, all the best to you and yours.
My deepest condolences Joey..  Hopefully we can help bring you some comfort in your time of need.  Either way, I'm here for ya.  Be well.

Not such a good year for so many great people on here. Sorry to hear about your loss Joey.  Always keep him in your heart and he's remain there forever. Patsy and I extend our condolences to you and your family.
I am so sorry to hear this Joey.Our thoughts and prayers are with you. Joe
